I think this is a duplicate of bug 181271

It happens on normal Java SE project that doesn't involve any Java EE.
Changing the priority and severity of it, as it is highly annoying.

I see that this was opened against Eclipse 3.3 M4 (and WTP 2.0 M4).  There has been an M5, M6, RC1, RC2, and now RC3 released since then.  Can you reproduce this on Eclipse 3.3 RC3 (with WTP 2.0 RC3)?

This is opened against 3.3 RC4, not M4.
And it is not related to WTP.

Michael, the build ID you specified was eclipse.buildId=I20061214-1445, which is in line with the dates for M4 (not RC4), and the headline still states M4.  You say this has nothing to do with WTP, but the class that is showing the NPE is a WTP class:
org.eclipse.wst.server.ui.internal.actions.RunOnServerActionDelegate.selectionChanged(RunOnServerActionDelegate.java:727)
I am assigning this bug to wst.server.

Ditto to Carl's comments - the stack trace doesn't line up to the code in RC4, but I think I've found the corresponding line in an earlier version. Mapping back the bug still exists in 2.0 and 3.0 streams and is caused by a lack of initialized module artifacts on the currently selected object.
